subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored a stoppage-time equalizer for the Netherlands in a 1-1 draw with Turkey, keeping alive the Dutch’s hopes of qualifying for the 2016 European Championship.
snippet: Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scored a stoppage-time equalizer for the Netherlands in a 1-1 draw with Turkey, keeping alive the Dutch’s hopes of qualifying for the 2016 European Championship.
